mapper.sql: ID, SITEID, PARENTID, ORDERID, CNAME, ENAME, DIRNAME, EDITOR, EXTNAME, CREATEDATE, LASTUPDATED, ISDEFINEATTR, HASARTICLEMODEL, ISAUDITED, ISPRODUCT, ISPUBLISHMORE, LANGUAGETYPE, COLUMNDESC, XMLTEMPLATE, CONTENTSHOWTYPE, ISRSS, GETRSSARTICLETIME, ARCHIVINGRULES, USEARTICLETYPE, ISTYPE, USERFLAG, USERLEVEL, SHAREFLAG, XMLTYPE, ARTICLECOUNT, PUBLICFLAG, TITLEPIC, VTITLEPIC, SOURCEPIC, AUTHORPIC, CONTENTPIC, SPECIALPIC, PRODUCTPIC, PRODUCTSMALLPIC, TS_PIC, S_PIC, MS_PIC, M_PIC, ML_PIC, L_PIC, TL_PIC
mapper.select: select ID,SITEID,PARENTID from TBL_COLUMN where PARENTID = #{PARENTID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT * FROM tbl_column where SITEID = #{SITEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and PARENTID > 0 order by ORDERID desc

select
from TBL_COLUMN where SITEID = #{SITEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and PARENTID = 0
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_column where SITEID = #{SITEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select min(id) from TBL_COLUMN where SITEID = #{SITEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
